name: gelf-pro
author: Kanstantsin Kamkou <kkamkou@gmail.com>
description: The Graylog Extended Log Format for the Node.js

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec; ([ `node -v | cut -d'v' -f2 | cut -d. -f1` -gt 3 ] && (cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage) || true)
